head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ANDRES, STEPHEN C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ANDRES, STEPHEN C.

block.p: ANDRES--Stephen C., of Upper Montclair, NJ, on June 16, 2007. Born April 7, 1921. Husband of Else, father of Steven, Tim and Robert. Grandfather of four, great-grandfather of two. He will be dearly missed with everlasting love. Visitation at the Hugh M. Moriarty Funeral Home, 76 Park St., Montclair, NJ, on Tuesday from 2-4 and 7-9pm with a Memorial Service starting at 3:30pm.

ANDRES--Stephen C., of Upper Montclair, NJ, on June 16, 2007. Born April 7, 1921. Husband of Else, father of Steven, Tim and Robert. Grandfather of four, great-grandfather of two. He will be dearly missed with everlasting love. Visitation at the Hugh M. Moriarty Funeral Home, 76 Park St., Montclair, NJ, on Tuesday from 2-4 and 7-9pm with a Memorial Service starting at 3:30pm.
